jobs_results.title: Senior iOS Developer (Remote)
jobs_results.description:
üöÄ What's the position?

This is a Full-time Senior iOS Developer position at Neybox for talented individuals who want to work on cutting-edge applications that positively impact the well-being of individuals worldwide.

üí´ What will I be working on?

You'll be working on our two apps: Pillow, a sleep-tracking app, and Today, which is a quantified-self wellness app.

Both apps have won an Editors' Choice distinction and have been featured multiple times in press and media. They have millions of users worldwide and a great roadmap ahead.

üßë‚Äçüíª What will be my role and responsibilities?

As a senior developer you will be responsible for
‚Ä¢ Building new features
‚Ä¢ Fixing bugs
‚Ä¢ Maintaining the existing codebase
‚Ä¢ Writting Unit Tests for existing and new features
‚Ä¢ Making sure the documentation of the project is accurate and helpful
‚Ä¢ Doing research on new technologies and frameworks
‚Ä¢ ‚ö†Ô∏èThis is a position that requires a commitment of 40 hours per week. This is not a part-time position.

üõ†Ô∏è What's the tech stack?

In a nutshell:

Both our apps are written in Swift (MVVM and MVC).

The UI is written in SwiftUI and UIKit.

We write Unit Tests; the code is clean and well-documented.

We make extensive use of various frameworks and machine learning.

Both apps are available for iOS only.

üåç Can I work remotely?

Of course! Our team is 100% remote. We have flexible working hours, but a good overlap between our time zones is required.

üôå What is it like working at Neybox?

Our team is small by design (6-8 people). However, we work closely together every day (Mon-Fri). For coordination, we use Slack and Jira and keep meetings at a minimum.

There's no middle management to get in the way, and we encourage new ideas and close collaboration.

üíº What are the requirements?
‚Ä¢ 4+ years of iOS development experience in Swift
‚Ä¢ Experience in HealthKit, CoreML SwiftUI, UIKit, Core Animation, GCD, Core Data, and WatchKit.
‚Ä¢ Experience working with Git version control, Unit testing, and Continuous Integration
‚Ä¢ Experience in performance profiling with Instruments on Xcode.
‚Ä¢ Proficient use of English, both writing and speaking.
‚Ä¢ Willingness to learn and experiment with new technologies.
‚Ä¢ References from previous employers in written or spoken form may be required from previous employers.
‚Ä¢ Proficient in usage of MacOS and iOS.

üì• Great! How can I apply?

Just hit "Apply" button below!

‚ö†Ô∏è Please note that this is the only acceptable way to apply. All other ways of contacting Neybox about the position (social media, LinkedIn, email etc.), will result in immediate rejection.

jobs_results.title: Software Mobile Engineer, iOS
jobs_results.description:
Location Qualifications: Bucharest (hybrid, 2 days in the office)
‚Ä¢ *Position Overview:
‚Ä¢ *Are you an iOS developer that is enthusiastic about creating outstanding mobile apps that offer smooth and simple user interfaces? Do you flourish in a team-oriented setting that values creativity and ongoing education? If yes, we would love to have YOU work for Showpad as a Mobile iOS Developer!
‚Ä¢ *Key Responsibilities :
‚Ä¢ *You will be in charge of creating Showpad's popular iPhone and iPad apps as a Mobile iOS Developer. Your efforts will have a direct effect on how our users interact with Showpad. This position offers you the chance to develop, coach, and create with a bright group of impact-driven individuals.
‚Ä¢ Build: Design, develop, and maintain high-performing iOS applications.
‚Ä¢ Innovate: Research and experiment with the latest iOS technologies to deliver cutting-edge solutions.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate: Work closely with design, QA, and product teams to create user-focused features.
‚Ä¢ Lead: Coach team members on iOS best practices and lead the way in quality engineering.
‚Ä¢ Refine: Improve build and deployment processes, ensuring smooth and efficient releases.
‚Ä¢ Problem-Solve: Partner with QA teams to identify and resolve technical issues, ensuring a stable and reliable app experience

What we‚Äôre looking for:
‚Ä¢ Experience: 3+ years of professional iOS development experience.
‚Ä¢ Skills: Proficiency in Swift and SwiftUI (Objective-C knowledge is a bonus!).
‚Ä¢ Expertise: A strong understanding of UI/UX design principles and experience building intuitive, scalable applications.
‚Ä¢ Mindset: A hunger to stay ahead of the curve with the latest iOS frameworks and technologies.
‚Ä¢ Collaborator: Proven ability to work effectively in a distributed team environment.
‚Ä¢ Mentor: A passion for sharing knowledge and helping teammates grow.

Company Highlights:

Founded in 2011, Showpad is the world‚Äôs leading Enablement Operating System (eOS‚Ñ¢). We align Sales and Marketing teams around impactful content and measurable engagement, enabling sellers to build unique buying experiences and continuously improve conversion rates. Sellers close more deals ‚Äì faster ‚Äì with Showpad.

With dual-headquarters in Ghent and Chicago, regional offices in London, Munich, Bucharest and Wroclaw, and remote hubs across the US and EMEA, Showpad is powered by a diverse global workforce of more than 550 people. Our employee value proposition centers around impact, purpose and belonging. Our culture is based on flexibility, trust and setting people up for success. At Showpad, we foster inclusion, innovate for impact and never stop to raise the bar. We take serious care of our people but never take ourselves too seriously.

What you can expect from Showpad

We welcome every voice and are committed to building a truly inclusive environment where your differences are not just welcomed, they are celebrated. We‚Äôre building a best-in-class experience for our employees and are always identifying opportunities to encourage our team to be their authentic selves. Whether that‚Äôs paid parental leave, paid holidays (including Juneteenth and paid time off to vote), paid time off to volunteer at non-profit organizations, personal development opportunities or professional stretch assignments, you can expect Showpad to support you.

We are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive organization and are proud to be an equal-opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, pregnancy, disability, age, veteran status, or other dimensions of identity.

jobs_results.title: Senior IOS Software Engineer
jobs_results.description:
The Role

As a Senior iOS Developer on the Design System Team, you will play a key role in the development and evolution of a unified, sophisticated design system for the client's entire product platform. You will work with a cross-functional team to build and maintain iOS components within a sophisticated, component-based design system. This system is designed to improve the user experience across various product teams, enabling them to build modern, consistent interfaces.

What you will do
‚Ä¢ Design and develop iOS applications, focusing on iOS-specific UI components (SwiftUI, UIKit)
‚Ä¢ Work with other engineers to build out and refine the CI/CD pipelines that automate the deployment of iOS components
‚Ä¢ Maintain and enhance the front-end developer experience, collaborating closely with engineers working on the web components (React/Angular) and sharing best practices across platforms.

Requirements
‚Ä¢ 5+ years of professional experience in iOS development, with a strong portfolio of released iOS applications.
‚Ä¢ In-depth knowledge of Swift
‚Ä¢ Hands-on experience with mobile app architecture patterns (MVC, MVVM, etc.) and best practices.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with UI component libraries such as Material UI, Angular Material, Ant Design, Chakra, or proprietary solutions.
‚Ä¢ Solid understanding of mobile UI/UX principles and accessibility standards.

What we offer
‚Ä¢ Hybrid / remote working model () and flexible working schedule
‚Ä¢ Private Health Insurance
‚Ä¢ People Lead system for your personal development
‚Ä¢ A culture of continuous growth, providing various training resources
‚Ä¢ Referral System
‚Ä¢ A community-first mindset, focusing on health-related initiatives, community events, team‚Äìbuildings
‚Ä¢ Technical equipment you can choose
‚Ä¢ Agile mindset, simplified processes, and a great atmosphere where commitment and autonomy are celebrated
‚Ä¢ Work with talented people across technology products and consulting

() As we hire permanent employees for this role, we offer remote opportunities only in Romania, Lithuania and Hungary.

About us

Zenitech is a leading technology solutions provider dedicated to reshaping the global digital landscape. Headquartered in the UK, Zenitech operates internationally, with offices in Lithuania, Romania, and Hungary.

We use a bespoke approach depending upon where the client is on their digital journey, comprising a combination of access to dedicated R&D labs, technology implementation advice, and specialist nearshore development talent. As an international community of individuals who are open to learn from each other, we collectively define and input into the digital future of the clients‚Äô businesses.

Why Zenitech?
‚Ä¢ Impactful Projects: Drive meaningful change through digital transformation projects and have an opportunity to make an impact on many different industries.
‚Ä¢ Collaborative Culture: Be part of a diverse, inclusive team committed to growth, innovation, and continuous learning.
‚Ä¢ Professional Growth: Zenitech supports continuous learning and development through the People Lead system, helping you advance your skills and career.

Diversity and Inclusion

Zenitech celebrates diversity in all its forms. We aim to create an inclusive environment where everyone feels valued for their unique contributions and perspectives. If you require any adjustments during the application process, please let us know‚Äîwe‚Äôre here to help. Our commitment to diversity, equity, inclusion, and belonging can be found here.

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer (SWIFT)
Carige ‚Äì 2 Senior iOS developer/Journeyman-Master
jobs_results.description:
We are looking for an IOS Developer who possesses a passion for pushing mobile technologies to the limits and will work with our team of talented engineers to design and build the next generation of our mobile applications.

Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Design and build advanced applications for the IOS platform
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features
‚Ä¢ Work with outside data sources and API‚Äôs
‚Ä¢ Unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability
‚Ä¢ Work on bug fixing and improving application performance
‚Ä¢ Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency
‚Ä¢ Share your knowledge actively with your colleagues

Requirements:
‚Ä¢ BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related subject
‚Ä¢ Proven software development experience
‚Ä¢ Proven working experience in IOS development
‚Ä¢ Have published at least one original IOS app
‚Ä¢ Experience working with remote data via REST and JSON
‚Ä¢ Experience with third-party libraries and APIs
‚Ä¢ Working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies
‚Ä¢ Solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle
‚Ä¢ At least 3 years of experience in professional Mobile application development, especially IOS APIs and Frameworks
‚Ä¢ Fundamentals in object-oriented design, algorithm design, problem solving, and complexity analysis
‚Ä¢ Experience building complex IOS Apps that have been successfully delivered to customers
‚Ä¢ Experience with IOS patterns, material design and material design backward compatibility
‚Ä¢ Experience with IOS SQLite database and working with hardware features(camera)
‚Ä¢ Knowledge in Maven, Gradle, Continuous integration (egg Jenkins)
‚Ä¢ Good overview of current development trends, frameworks and good knowledge of news sources, podcasts, tutorials etc.
‚Ä¢ Good team player who is self-motivated and well organized

Required language:

English ‚Äì fluent

Required Professional and Technical Expertise:
‚Ä¢ Experience with IOS
‚Ä¢ Experience working with remote data via REST and JSON
‚Ä¢ Experience with third-party libraries and APIs
‚Ä¢ Working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies
‚Ä¢ Solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle
‚Ä¢ At least 3 years of experience in professional Mobile application development, especially IOS APIs and Frameworks

Preferred Professional and Technical Expertise:
‚Ä¢ Knowledge in Maven, Gradle, Continuous integration (egg Jenkins)

jobs_results.title: Senior Swift iOS
jobs_results.description:
We fuse together exceptional talent who deliver outstanding software solutions. Our approach has helped us grow 60% in 2021, 94% in 2022, while in 2023 we joined forces with Insight, a Fortune 500 company and a leading solutions and systems integrator. With exciting growth plans and cutting-edge projects, there has never been a better time to join our incredible team.

We‚Äôre growing fast and are looking for a iOS Developer professional to work on an exciting international software development project. You‚Äôll work with the latest technologies in our bright, talented team. The environment at Amdaris is synergistic and supportive, so everyone can build the career they want in an organization going from strength to strength.

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES

‚Ä¢ Design and build applications for the iOS platform

‚Ä¢ Design, code, test, debug and document software according to the functional requirements

‚Ä¢ Analyse, diagnose and resolve errors relating to mobile applications

‚Ä¢ Define and lead the implementation of mobile application architecture and development aligned with industry best practices and patterns

‚Ä¢ Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications

‚Ä¢ Collaborate with a team to define, design, and ship new features

‚Ä¢ Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs

‚Ä¢ Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization

JOB REQUIREMENTS

‚Ä¢ Proficient with Objective-C or Swift, and Cocoa Touch

‚Ä¢ Experience with iOS frameworks such as Core Data, Core Animation, etc.

‚Ä¢ Experience with offline storage, threading, and performance tuning

‚Ä¢ Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect iOS applications to back-end services

‚Ä¢ Knowledge of other web technologies and UI/UX standards

‚Ä¢ Understanding of Apple‚Äôs design principles and interface guidelines

‚Ä¢ Familiarity with cloud message APIs and push notifications

‚Ä¢ Knack for benchmarking and optimisation

‚Ä¢ Familiarity with continuous integration

‚Ä¢ Excellent English both written and verbally

To see more roles, click here.

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
We are looking for exceptional Mid/Senior iOS Developers to work with our cross-functional team and join our world-class community of talented experts in Romania.

For this position you should be able to check the following:
‚Ä¢ At least 3 years of experience in mobile development
‚Ä¢ Good technical expertise in writing testable and maintainable code in Swift and/or Objective-C with a focus on design patterns and SOLID principles
‚Ä¢ Good knowledge and experience in understanding and using architecture patterns, particularly MVVM
‚Ä¢ Proper understanding of threading and concurrency, as well as basic knowledge of reactive programming
‚Ä¢ Very good knowledge of networking, persistence, and development of custom UI components (UIKit, SwiftUI)
‚Ä¢ Skilled in source control management and code review processes. Experience with continuous integration is a plus.
‚Ä¢ Independent in specifying, planning, reporting, designing, and coding for his / her assigned tasks
‚Ä¢ Able to understand a project and the business behind an application in detail
‚Ä¢ Able to give estimates for new features based on minimal requirements/specifications
‚Ä¢ Able to identify risks/issues, and work with the technical lead to overcome them
‚Ä¢ Proactive attitude with a drive to improve mobile engineering architectures and processes.
‚Ä¢ Continuous learner interested in knowledge sharing
‚Ä¢ Good level of spoken and written English

A day in the life of an iOS Developer:
‚Ä¢ Design, build and support mobile experiences used by millions of users and many of your friends every day
‚Ä¢ Solve complex technical issues and improve existing mobile applications
‚Ä¢ Evaluate, design, and develop new features and frameworks
‚Ä¢ Focus on high-performance mobile application implementations
‚Ä¢ Work closely with designers, product management, and other teams to create unique mobile apps in a highly collaborative environment
‚Ä¢ Continuously discover and evaluate new technologies for maximizing development efficiency
‚Ä¢ Engage in knowledge-sharing activities.

Cognizant Romania Employee Benefits:
‚Ä¢ Flexible Work Schedule - Outside of main work hours, you can create a schedule that suits your needs.
‚Ä¢ Hybrid workplace - Whether you like to work from home or go to the office, the choice is yours!
‚Ä¢ Annual Vacation Days - 26 days to relax, explore and spend time with loved ones.
‚Ä¢ Trainings, workshops, and certifications, unlimited Udemy subscription and more.
‚Ä¢ Private medical package
‚Ä¢ Meal tickets
‚Ä¢ Referral bonuses
‚Ä¢ Life insurance
‚Ä¢ Banking services
‚Ä¢ Bookster

Cognizant Romania is home to 2500+ creative technologists and is one of Eastern Europe's largest Software Product Engineering delivery networks. We serve global clients in several industries, including Banking & Financial Services, Insurance, Healthcare & Life Sciences, Communication Media & Technology, and Retail & MLEU (manufacturing, logistics, energy & utilities).

Our product thinking mindset defines, builds, and launches new, experience-centered software products that reinvent business.

Cognizant Romania (formerly Cognizant Softvision) was founded in the early 1990s to be the engineering partner for thriving Silicon Valley tech startups. The organization prides itself on its great culture and reputation for attracting and developing the best technical talent in Romania and providing all of Cognizant with end-to-end delivery expertise.

Please note that only suitable candidates will be contacted and that by applying to this role you are being informed about your personal data being processed by Cognizant.

You can find more details here: https://www.cognizant.com/us/en/privacy-notice

Equal Employment & Affirmative Action Policy:

Cognizant is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, race, color, religion, national origin, disability, protected Veteran status, age, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Benefits
‚Ä¢ Great globally diverse culture
‚Ä¢ Flexible work-life balance
‚Ä¢ Ongoing career development
‚Ä¢ Relocation opportunities
‚Ä¢ Competitive Salary

jobs_results.title: Developers ‚Äì mobile Devices (iOS, Android)
jobs_results.description:
Our customer is a German software developer, one of the market leaders in Germany in the field of ERP-solutions for Facility Management. The corporation founded in 1979 supports over 400 customers throughout the whole country who are using the ERP applications of the company for more than 20 years. 70 employees ensure the steady development of the product as well as consultancy and implementation at the customer site.

For several years our client is present with a steadily growing team of developers in Cluj. This is where the competence centre of the group will be established for the implementation of the enterprise‚Äôs solutions for mobile devices. For our customer‚Äôs office in Cluj wer are looking for:

Developers ‚Äì mobile Devices (iOS, Android)

Qualifications:
‚Ä¢ Degree in Computer Science or equivalent qualification
‚Ä¢ Experience in programming languages for mobile devices like ‚ÄûObjective C‚Äú and Java (for Android)
‚Ä¢ Experience in programming application for mobile devices (iOS/Android)
‚Ä¢ Advanced command of written and spoken English (German language skills are a plus)
‚Ä¢ Ability to familiarize easily with a business software
‚Ä¢ Team player and flexible
‚Ä¢ Conceptual and innovative thinking, quality-oriented work
‚Ä¢ Srong customer and service orientation, high level of initiative

Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Further development, maintenance and modernisation of our software
‚Ä¢ Conception and development of new apps
‚Ä¢ Integration of various mobile devices
‚Ä¢ Implementation of the business requirements of the departments/ customers
‚Ä¢ Quality control of the developed applications
‚Ä¢ Implementation of own projects
‚Ä¢ Participation in customer events

Our customer offers :
‚Ä¢ Possibility to work in a modern environment with an international team
‚Ä¢ Competitive salary and excellent personal development opportunities
‚Ä¢ Participation in a dynamic and innovative service-oriented German company with over 400 customers.
